attributes.action: Mandatory Drug And Alcohol Testing For All MP’s And House Of Lords Members.
attributes.background: Following the recent scandal involving Lord Sewel, All MP’s And House Of Lords Members should be tested for Drug And Alcohol. Any one testing positive should Resign / Step down.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
